title: Leftwards Hand Dark Skin Tone
description: A hand pointing to the left, with a dark skin tone. Used to indicate direction, to draw attention to something on the left, or to express a negative or dismissive sentiment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the leftwards hand emoji with a dark skin tone is rendered with meticulous detail, showcasing a smooth, rounded palm and fingers pointing to the left. Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading give the hand a tactile and dimensional quality, suggesting a clear direction or emphasis. This emoji, with its rich, dark skin tone representation, is commonly used on Apple devices to indicate movement, a turn, or to draw attention to something positioned to the left.
